input.sentences: [female] was from a wealthy family that liked to travel .
[male] was from a wealthy family as well .

output.sentences: There was a wealthy female who had set off on a travel adventure.
She met a wealthy male and decided she wanted to start a family with him.
Shortly after meeting, they got married.
The wealthy female had two daughters.
The first female was named Eliza.
